channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: エピック対グーグル：グーグル幹部が、ユーザーがスポティファイの支払いシステム経由でサブスクリプションを購入した場合、スポティファイは手数料を支払わず、グーグル経由で支払った場合は4％を支払うことを確認（The Verge）
item.description:
The Verge:
Epic v. Google: a Google exec confirms that Spotify pays no commission when users buy subscriptions via Spotify's payment system and 4% when they pay via Google  —  Music streaming service Spotify struck a seemingly unique and highly generous deal with Google for Android-based payments …

item.title: ラドバイブル・グループは、同ブランドの既存のユニラッド・テック・ソーシャルページを発展させるため、技術系コンテンツの視聴者が前年比187％増加したことを受け、技術系ウェブサイトを立ち上げた（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
LADbible Group launches a tech website to help build on the brand's existing Unilad Tech social pages, after the audience for its tech content grew 187% YoY  —  The launch builds on Unilad Tech's social audience of 18 million followers.  —  Ladbible Group has launched a dedicated tech website …

item.title: ジェフ・ザッカー氏率いるレッドバードIMIがテレグラフ紙とスペクテイター紙の経営権を取得すると発表。
item.description:
Press Gazette:
Jeff Zucker's RedBird IMI says it will take control of the Telegraph and Spectator after agreeing to a loan of £600M to repay debts owed by the Barclay family  —  Abu Dhabi-backed investment fund RedBird IMI has said it is set to take control of the Telegraph and Spectator publications …

item.title: リンダ・ヤカリーノは従業員へのメモの中で、Xの広告に関するMedia Mattersの報道は「誤解を招く」ものであり、Xは「欺瞞的な攻撃」と戦っている最中だと述べている（Caitlin Huston/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Caitlin Huston / The Hollywood Reporter:
In a note to employees, Linda Yaccarino says the Media Matters report about ads on X is “misleading” and that X is in the midst of battling “deceptive attacks”  —  In a note to employees, the X CEO said that reports of antisemitic content on the platform come from a “misleading and manipulated article.”

item.title: 大手広告主がXから逃げた後、ベニー・ジョンソン、アンドリュー・テイト、ギャヴィン・マクインズ、バビロン・ビーのような右派メディアやインフルエンサーが広告の購入や寄付を約束（Matt Binder/Mashable）
item.description:
Matt Binder / Mashable:
After big advertisers flee X, right-wing media outlets and influencers pledge to buy ads or donate, like Benny Johnson, Andrew Tate, Gavin McInnes, Babylon Bee  —  So far, they are at least hundreds of millions of dollars short on making up for X's potential lost revenue. … Disney.

item.title: 情報筋リンダ・ヤッカリーノ、息子でX幹部のマット・マドラゾに米共和党の広告主への働きかけを依頼、Xは2024年の選挙で1億ドルの政治広告を目指す（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Sources: Linda Yaccarino asked her son and X executive Matt Madrazo to reach out to GOP ad spenders; X aims for $100M in political ads during the 2024 elections  —  The Scoop  —  Linda Yaccarino, the CEO of X, formerly Twitter, has turned the service's Hail Mary bet on an imagined $100 …

item.title: 週末にガザで、プレス・ハウス・パレスチナの役員を率いていたベラル・ジャダラ氏と2人のフリージャーナリストが殺害された。
item.description:
Reuters:
Belal Jadallah, who led the board of the Press House-Palestine, and two freelance journalists were killed in Gaza over the weekend, per relatives  —  The head of a prominent media institution in Gaza and two other journalists were killed during the weekend in Israel's offensive in the territory …

item.title: 元NYSE社長が経営する暗号取引所BullishがCoinDeskを全額現金で非公開で買収、DCGは2016年にCoinDeskを50万ドルで買収（Vicky Ge Huang/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Vicky Ge Huang / Wall Street Journal:
Crypto exchange Bullish, run by a former NYSE president, acquires CoinDesk for an undisclosed sum in an all-cash deal; DCG acquired CoinDesk for $500K in 2016  —  CoinDesk says former Wall Street Journal Editor in Chief Matt Murray will chair an independent editorial committee

item.title: 英国のGlobalと米国のiHeart Mediaが、それぞれの市場で互いのポッドキャストのライセンス供与と配信を計画、GlobalはThe Athleticと広告契約を締結（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
UK-based Global and US-based iHeart Media plan to license and distribute each other's podcasts in their home markets; Global signed an ad deal with The Athletic  —  Global and iHeart Media will license and distribute each other's podcasts in their home markets.

item.title: ローカルニュースのウェブサイトを作るだけでなく、ネクストドアやフェイスブックのローカルグループに記者を組み込み、「ビートを歩く」ことでネタのアイデアを得る必要がある（Steven Waldman/Poynter）
item.description:
Steven Waldman / Poynter:
In addition to creating local news websites, outlets need to embed reporters in Nextdoor and Facebook local groups to “walk the beat” and get story ideas  —  Its reach is on par with, if not greater than, US newspapers.  Instead of harrumphing its lack of journalistic standards, why don't we embed reporters?

item.title: TMZの情報提供者ネットワーク、地元警察当局との緊密な関係、スターが死亡した際のセレブの愛する人への影響について（The Hollywood Reporter紙）
item.description:
The Hollywood Reporter:
A look at TMZ's network of informants, its close relationships with local law enforcement officials, and its effect on celebrities' loved ones when stars die  —  After being tipped on Matthew Perry's death, the site's close ties to law enforcement and habit of paying sources gets new scrutiny.

item.title: Foxによると、アメリカ人がテレビを見る機会が激減しているにもかかわらず、NFLの視聴率は先週時点で前年比6％増、カレッジフットボールは2013年比で20％増となっている（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Despite Americans watching far less TV, NFL viewership is up 6% YoY, as of last week, and college football is up 20% compared to 2013, according to Fox  —  Americans watch far less TV than they did a decade ago.  But they watch even more football.  —  Good evening from the nation's capital.

item.title: 情報筋：広告幹部がリンダ・ヤカリーノに、人種差別と反ユダヤ主義について声明を出すために、彼女の評判を危険にさらし、XのCEOを辞任すべきだと伝えた（Forbes誌）
item.description:
Forbes:
Sources: ad executives told Linda Yaccarino that she is risking her reputation and should step down as X's CEO to make a statement about racism and antisemitism  —  In the aftermath of IBM, Disney, Apple and others pausing spending on X, formerly known as Twitter, top advertising executives …

item.title: Disney+ Hotstarは、11月19日のインド対オーストラリアのICCクリケット・ワールドカップ決勝戦で、同時ストリーミング視聴者数59Mを記録した（Manish Singh/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Manish Singh / TechCrunch:
Disney+ Hotstar topped a record 59M concurrent streaming viewers during the India-Australia ICC Cricket World Cup final on November 19  —  In India, few events garner as much attention as a cricket game.  And there's no match for a World Cup final.  —  The Sunday game has already topped …

item.title: Jezebelのオーラル・ヒストリー：その始まり、他のフェミニスト・ブログへの影響、ライターたちがどのように声を高めていったか、ドナルド・トランプ勝利後のトーンなど（Kate Dwyer/New York Times）
item.description:
Kate Dwyer / New York Times:
An oral history of Jezebel: its start, influencing other feminist blogs, how its writers developed their voices, its tone after Donald Trump's win, and more  —  The site defined an era of feminism for millions of readers.  According to its editors and writers, it was also an exhilarating place to work.
